Investor_5.name: James Wang
Investor_5.content: My disciplined approach to investing, characterized by strategic planning and a focus on maximizing returns, reinforces my reputation as a serious and goal-oriented investor. I am recognized for effectively providing resources with expectations aligned to the performance outcomes. This investment experience has further solidified my standing as a reliable and astute investor.

Trustee_2.name: David Johnson
Trustee_2.content: Although David Johnson's investment report matched the proposed allocation plan, the discrepancies in the actual allocation process reveal concerns regarding his reliability and transparency. His initial intent to act in my best interest is overshadowed by the lack of consistency, leading to doubts about his trustworthiness and competence. This tarnishes his reputation as a trustee.
